description.paragraph1: Hi! I'm Kevin, a Systems & Computer Engineering graduate from Universidad de los Andes. I love building things with code and solving problems through software development, data engineering, and AI.
description.paragraph2: I enjoy learning new technologies and working on projects that make a difference. Currently pursuing my Master's degree while exploring modern web development and data systems.
